customMode.createModeDesc: Define a custom agent mode with specific behavior, tools, and settings
customMode.editModeDesc: Modify your custom agent mode settings
customMode.name: Name
customMode.systemPromptPlaceholder: You are a helpful assistant that specializes in...
customMode.livePreviewDesc: Enable live preview for generated content
customMode.modelOverridePlaceholder: Leave empty to use default model
customMode.a2uiSettingsDesc: Configure dynamic UI generation for this mode
customMode.enableA2UIDesc: Generate interactive UI components with AI responses
customMode.generateFromDescriptionDesc: Describe your ideal agent and let AI configure it for you
customMode.generationPromptPlaceholder: e.g., Create a coding assistant that helps with Python development and code review...
customMode.exampleCoding: Create a coding assistant for Python with code review and debugging tools
customMode.exampleResearch: Build a research assistant that can search academic papers and summarize findings
customMode.exampleWriting: Design a writing assistant for blog posts with SEO optimization
customMode.exampleData: Create a data analysis helper with calculation and visualization capabilities
customMode.templateVarsHint: Click to insert. Variables are replaced at runtime.

agentOptimization.title: Agent Optimization
agentOptimization.description: Configure Claude best practices for agent systems including smart routing, token budget, and context isolation.

smartRouting.title: Smart Routing
smartRouting.subtitle: Automatically decide single vs multi-agent execution
smartRouting.enableDesc: Let the system analyze task complexity and choose the optimal execution strategy
smartRouting.thresholdDesc: Higher values prefer single agent execution for simpler tasks

tokenBudget.title: Token Budget
tokenBudget.subtitle: Control costs in multi-agent scenarios
tokenBudget.enableDesc: Limit total tokens used by sub-agents to control costs

contextIsolation.title: Context Isolation
contextIsolation.subtitle: Prevent context pollution between agents
contextIsolation.enableDesc: Isolate sub-agent contexts to prevent information overflow
contextIsolation.summarizeDesc: Compress sub-agent outputs before passing to parent agent

skillsMcp.title: Skills-MCP Auto-Loading
skillsMcp.subtitle: Automatically load relevant skills for MCP tools
skillsMcp.enableDesc: Automatically inject skill knowledge when matching MCP tools are used
skillsMcp.info: When enabled, skills with associated MCP servers or tool keywords will be automatically loaded into the agent context when those tools are active. This combines procedural knowledge (skills) with tool connectivity (MCP).

toolWarnings.title: Tool Warnings
toolWarnings.subtitle: Alert when tool count is too high
toolWarnings.enableDesc: Show warnings when active tools exceed the recommended limit
